card.text: {T}: Add {C}. WU, {T}: Target player mills two cards. Then if that player’s graveyard has twelve or more cards in it, create a 2/2 white Zombie creature token with lifelink and decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Thread the Undergrowth
card.text: Create three 2/1 green Spider creature tokens with reach.
